title: I want help
body:
when I open the LeagueClient I click on Launch and They says I don't have any parts from program but, if Isearch it in my computer i find those files
files are: BugSplat.dll, libcurl.dll, libssl-1_1.dll and librcypto-1_1.dll.

replies.body:
This can sometimes happen when the client files get a little out of whack from a patch going wrong. Follow the steps in the image I'm posting below, and you should be able to get that client to repair itself and get back on the rift.

https://i.gyazo.com/d6976e1b060022dede938ce98d031890.png
